New_Brunswick.Metuchen School District:
The Metuchen School District is a comprehensive community public school district that serves students in kindergarten through twelfth grade from Metuchen, in Middlesex County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2011-12 school year, the district's four schools had an enrollment of 2,109 students and 166.6 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 12.66:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "I", the second-highest of eight groupings.
